description:
Like last week, I wasn't really sure when I should air this video. Since it is Maverick getting another blow job, I thought I would just put it up as a bonus video on a 2-4-2sday.
This videos was filmed before Adam blew him on the massage table. Maverick was still struggling with working with a dude. He actually really liked the blow job from the Serviced video, and he kept asking to do another one..BUT he didn't want to see who was blowing him. Hence the Glory Hole Scene.
He obviously got over that with the video with Adam (just barely!), but I think this video has a lot of appeal if you like a little cum swallowing.
Maverick can cum gobs, and he loves it when it shoots down a girls throat (or apparently a dude), and that thought seems to get him off like no other.
So this time I choked down a couple globs. I figured you'd seen him cum before, and you wouldn't begrudge me a gulp or two. Thankfully he nuts so much it just pours out. It's pretty hot watching the volume keep dripping out.
I'm still working on him to finally fuck a guy, and I think I might have him agreed to it. Stay tuned!
title: Bryan & Maverick - G:hOle Oral
